name: Hayat ilyas
bio: As a passionate and ambitious individual, I am excited to pursue a career as a React Developer, JavaScript Developer, Frontend, Backend, and Fullstack Developer. While I may not have any professional experience, I have been developing my skills through personal projects and online courses, and I am eager to apply these skills in a professional setting. My technical skills include proficiency in React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, and various backend technologies. I am constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the industry
